data.name: Pinball Wicked - Supporter Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
You like Pinball Wicked and want more?
You want to support the game's development?
You relish eyecandy, glowing stuff and customization options?
Or You are positive that one just can't have enough balls?

Then this Supporter Upgrade DLC is perfect for you!

Treat yourself to a bunch of new Balls, including the exceptional glowing orbs, and to the additional Ambiences: Wanna play in the red Mutiny Style as default? Now you can!

Buying this DLC is first and foremost showing your support for the development of Pinball Wicked. With the Supporter Upgrade you receive our heartfelt gratitude!



Balls Included

The Orbs are glowing balls that illuminate their immediate surrounding area. You can choose Random Orbs to play with all the different glowing balls at once.

  • White Pearl and Glowing Pearl
  • Gold and Glowing Gold
  • Dark Orb
  • Green-Orange Orb
  • Electric-Pink Orb
  • Blue Waves Orb
  • Green Orb
  • Red Orb
  • Lime Orb

The Default Ambience settings


  • Twilight (this is the normal default setting in the base game)
  • Daylight (Warm)
  • Daylight (Cold)
  • Storm - blue, like during Storm Adventure
  • Mutiny - red, like during The Mutiny
  • Kraken - green, like during The Kraken Adventure
  • Golden - golden with very bright morning glow fog, like during The Booty Bash

Stay tuned! Have fun! Flip out!

data.short_description: Show your support for the development of Pinball Wicked and Treat yourself to additional Ambiences and to a bunch of new balls, including the exceptional glowing orbs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3 2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: Medium Settings, 60 FPS @ 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5 2500k or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: Wicked / Epic Settings, 60 FPS @ 1080p

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
